content.description: Follow the dihedral up to the anchors of The Girlfriend Route.
content.location: Start in the slot to the left of the tall boulder.

climbs.name: Paradise
climbs.fa: Curtis Baird, Gabriel Skiera, Philip Lewis

content.description: This is a reestablished version of Far Route. Follow the bolts up as they trend right until you gain the big ledge, following the path of least resistance. Then past one more bolt to anchors.
content.protection: BOLTS AND ANCHORS HAVE BEEN REMOVED BY UNKNOWN INDIVIDUAL(S)
content.location: Start in the slot on the left side of the tall boulder.

climbs.name: El Breezy
climbs.fa: Gabriel Skiera, Philip Lewis, Nathan Hitchcock

content.description: Climb the steep block section to the face and work your way up to the small roof. Move left for better holds and take it up to the anchors. 5 bolts to rings.
content.protection: BOLTS AND ANCHORS HAVE BEEN REMOVED BY UNKNOWN INDIVIDUAL(S)
content.location: Left of the tall boulder on the arete.

content.description: BOLTS AND ANCHORS HAVE BEEN REMOVED BY UNKNOWN INDIVIDUAL(S). Main Wall is the wall directly across the road from the main parking area for Backbone with the tall boulder. This is where most people set a top rope. Be careful when throwing down a rope if you are setting a top rope, there are often people at the bottom.
